greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: (Prime(n + 1) - Prime(n))/2 (mod 2).
comment: Questions: Is s(n) = (1/n) Sum[a(i),{i,2,n+1)] > 1/2 for all n? Does s(n) --> 1/2 ?
xref: Sequences related to the differences between successive primes: A001223 (Delta(p)), A028334, A080378, A104120, A330556-A330561.
results.author: _Joseph L. Pe_, Mar 06 2005
